import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({ cartItems, SetcartItems }) { console.log(cartItems); function increaseqty(){ let newCartItems = [...cartItems]; newCartItems.forEach((item) => { if (item.product._id === item.qty) { item.qty++; } }); SetcartItems(newCartItems); } return (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.product.description}

${item.product.price}

- +
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

); }
